# 目的
counts×metadata から `SummarizedExperiment` を構築する。

```r
suppressPackageStartupMessages({
  library(readr); library(dplyr); library(SummarizedExperiment); library(here)
})
counts <- read_csv(here("data","processed","airway_counts_small.csv"))
meta   <- read_csv(here("data","processed","airway_meta_small.csv"))
mat <- as.matrix(counts[,-ncol(counts)]); rownames(mat) <- counts$gene
coldata <- DataFrame(row.names=meta$sample_id, group=meta$group)
se <- SummarizedExperiment(assays=list(counts=mat), colData=coldata)
se
```
